LayoutNode.Content: Product Description Flavor: L'Orange (Lemon Orange) | Size: Pack of 24 Imagine the sweet citrusy flavor of orange and lemon paired with Perrier's sparkling bubbles. That's Perrier l'orange, a refreshing variation on the beverage that hasdelighted consumers for over 150 years. Perrier l'orange is wonderful on its own, but its tangy lemon twist makes it the perfect partner for cocktails and drinkrecipes. Originating in France, Perrier's effervescent spirit is known worldwide. The Perrier collection also offers a great alternative to carbonated soft drinks, withno sugar and zero calories. It's the ideal at-home or on-the-go beverage, making it a refreshing choice for every day.
LayoutNode.SRC:
Product Description

Flavor:L'Orange (Lemon Orange)  |  Size:Pack of 24

Imagine the sweet citrusy flavor of orange and lemon paired with Perrier's sparkling bubbles. That's Perrier l'orange, a refreshing variation on the beverage that has delighted consumers for over 150 years. Perrier l'orange is wonderful on its own, but its tangy lemon twist makes it the perfect partner for cocktails and drink recipes. Originating in France, Perrier's effervescent spirit is known worldwide. The Perrier collection also offers a great alternative to carbonated soft drinks, with no sugar and zero calories. It's the ideal at-home or on-the-go beverage, making it a refreshing choice for every day.
Product Details

LayoutNode.Content: 5.0 out of 5stars By AJ on January 25, 2016 Flavor: Original Size: Pack of 24 Verified Purchase The Perrier subscription through Amazon has been an absolute life saver. After months of driving 100+ milesround trip to purchase a 24-pack of plastic bottles, I can now have it delivered to my door. My only gripe is theprice fluctuates which can delay the delivery. I signed up when the cost was just over $16/case and dependingon stock, the price increases. Amazon will not ship the product until the stock increases/price drops. That being said, Perrier is addicting. I love the way the carbonation burns my throat; which makes it impossibleto ever enjoy regular bottled water again. Perrier also helps with appetite control. The added bubbles allow me tofeel full much faster. Read more Comment 5 people found this helpful. Was this review helpful to you? Yes No Report abuse

LayoutNode.Content: 4.0 out of 5stars By Grad Student on January 9, 2017 Flavor: Pink Grapefruit Size: Pack of 24 Verified Purchase Purely a taste preference. I like it: it's Perrier with a subtle taste of grapefruit. Simple as that. Not sure how elseone could describe this product. The shape of the bottle? Ergonomic and fits perfectly in the palm of your hand.The cap? Definitely overusing plastic and bad for the environment, but it spins right off. The price? Verycompetitive based on what I've seen. Bottom line, you either like pamplemousse or you don't. Enjoy! Read more Comment 2 people found this helpful. Was this review helpful to you? Yes No Report abuse

LayoutNode.Content: 5.0 out of 5stars By Debra VS on October 31, 2014 Flavor: Lime Size: Pack of 24 Verified Purchase Great, subtle taste without sugar or any sugar substitute. Please note that there isn't any fruit juice in this, justflavoring. I drink Perrier and other sparking waters as a soda / pop substitute. It works for me. I realized that itwas the fizz that I missed when I stopped drinking them. It's worth a little extra money to keep the sugar / sugarsubstitute in soda pop out of my diet. Read more Comment 5 people found this helpful. Was this review helpful to you? Yes No Report abuse

LayoutNode.Content: 1.0 out of 5stars By Amazon Buyer on May 16, 2015 Flavor: Original Size: Pack of 24 Verified Purchase I ordered a 24 pack of regular Perrier but when I opened the bottles, the water was flat - not carbonated. And,unfortunately, it has been every single bottle that I have opened so far (about 8 bottles). I have taken a closerlook at the remaining bottles and they look completely flat also. I don't know if carbonated water can go bad orget old.........but whatever happened to the bottles, ended up being shipped to me and I am not satisfied withthem. I looked for a way to contact the seller but I could not find any Contact Button. Read more Comment 9 people found this helpful. Was this review helpful to you? Yes No Report abuse
